mapper.select: /*[AdminNewsApi_SQL.xml].[getNewsInfo] */ SELECT news_seq, news_title, news_description, A.visible, A.creator, A.create_time, A.updater, A.update_time, B.image_file_id as imageFileId, C.FILE_NAME as fileName, C.FILE_PATH as filePath FROM app_board_news_test A left OUTER JOIN (select * from app_image_file_info_test where board_type_cd = 'brdt002' AND visible = 'Y') B ON A.news_seq = B.board_seq left outer join J_ATTACHFILE_TEST C on B.image_file_id = C.file_id WHERE news_seq = #{newsSeq}
mapper.update: /*[AdminNewsApi_SQL.xml].[updateNews] */ UPDATE app_board_news_test SET news_title = #{newsTitle}, news_description = #{newsDescription}, visible = #{visible}, updater = #{updater}, update_time = NOW() WHERE news_seq = #{newsSeq}
/*[AdminNewsApi_SQL.xml].[deleteNews] */ UPDATE app_board_news SET visible = 'D', updater = #{updater}, update_time = NOW() WHERE news_seq = #{newsSeq}
